name: Black Disposable Face Masks
description: A protective mask covering the nose and mouth.

name: Germ-X Original Hand Sanitizer, 8Fl Oz (12 Pack)
description: Applied to the hands for the purpose of removing common pathogens (disease-causing organisms).

name: Cottonelle Ultra 24 Family Mega Rolls
description: Paper sheets on a roll.

name: Purell Hand Sanitizing Wipes, Clean Refreshing Scent, 20 Count Travel Pack (Pack of 6)
description: Small, pre-moistened towels or towelettes that are used to clean hands.

name: Clorox Disinfecting Wipes
description: Small, pre-moistened towels or towelettes that are used to clean surfaces for the removal of dirt and bacteria, such as staph and salmonella that may have been placed on the affected surface from foods, persons or animals.

name: Forehead Thermometer
description: A thermometer that is placed on, passed over, or pointed at the forehead to measure a person's body temperature

name: Humidifier
description: A device for keeping the atmosphere moist in a room.

name: Softsoap Liquid Hand Soap
description: Soap in liquid form so you can clean your filthy hands!!

name: Pampers Diapers Pack (204)
description: Piece of absorbent material wrapped around a baby's bottom.

name: Kleenex anti-viral tissues
description: A disposable piece of absorbent paper, used especially as a handkerchief or for cleaning the skin.

name: L'Oreal Paris Excellence Creme Permanent Hair Color
description: A soluble substance for coloring hair. For all those pesky greys you have accumulated from the pandemic.

name: Electric heat pad
description: Electric mat that heats up and is held against the body to reduce pain. Great for any soreness that occurs while infected with COVID.

name: BinaxNOW COVID-19 Antigen Rapid Self-Test at Home Kit
description: Great product for those who are worried they might be infected but do not want to risk leaving their home.

name: Advil Cold and Sinus
description: Combines the relief of a strong decongestant to open your airways with the power of Advil to relieve the pain commonly associated with sinus pressure.

name: HEPA Air Purifiers for Home
description: Device that removes contaminating particles (such as dust, pollen, dander, and COVID if your feeling lucky) from the air.

name: The Complete Manual of Things That Might Kill You
description: The perfect book to prevent a person from ever sleeping again.

name: Dyson V7 Absolute Vacuum
description: An electrical apparatus that by means of suction collects dust and small particles from floors and other surfaces. Ideal for those elitists who want a vacuum that can survive the end of the world.

name: MY MEDIC medical kit
description: A bag containing medical supplies.

name: Brita Grand Water Pitcher
description: Stores water and removes unwanted substances such as bacteria or harmful chemicals. Please use only water for this product and do not try to fill it with any bodily fluids.

name: Theraflu ExpressMax Daytime and Nighttime Severe Cold and Cough Syrup Berry Flavor Combo Pack, 2 x 8.3 oz bottle
description: Used to relieve symptoms of a cold or for those who would rather treat COVID with a home remedy.
